features.name: Card Recognition API Integration
features.description: Manual text entry for Pokemon cards using PokemonTCG.io free API
acceptance: User can search for Pokemon card by name
User can select card set from search results
User can specify card number within selected set
App displays card image and details from PokemonTCG.io API
Card is saved to inventory after confirmation
Loading indicator displays while API fetches data
Error states show when API fails or card not found

features.name: SwiftData Persistence for Scanned Cards
features.description: Add data persistence so scanned cards are saved and survive app restarts
acceptance: ScannedCard model persists to SwiftData
Cards remain after app is closed and reopened
CardListView reads from SwiftData and displays all saved cards
Dashboard stats accurately reflect persisted card data
App launches and loads existing data without crashes

features.name: Inventory Management in CardListView
features.description: Build functional inventory list with search, filter, and card management features
acceptance: CardListView displays all scanned cards in scrollable list
User can search cards by name
User can filter by value range, card type, or date added
User can sort by name, value, or date
Tapping a card shows detail view with edit capability
User can delete cards from inventory
Empty state shows when no cards exist

features.name: Comprehensive Error Handling
features.description: Add proper error states and user feedback for all async operations
acceptance: Camera permission denied shows helpful alert with Settings link
Network errors display retry option
API errors show user-friendly messages
Failed card scans provide clear feedback
Loading indicators show during all async operations
Success confirmations appear for completed actions

features.name: Trade Analyzer Tool
features.description: Tool to compare two sets of cards and calculate trade fairness
acceptance: User can add cards to 'my side' and 'their side'
Tool calculates total value for each side
Shows value difference and percentage
User can add notes about the trade
Trade can be saved to history
User can scan cards directly into trade sides

features.name: Sales Calculator Tool
features.description: Calculate net profit after fees, shipping, and taxes for card sales
acceptance: User can input card price
User can select platform (eBay, TCGPlayer, etc.)
Calculator shows platform fees, shipping, processing fees
Net profit calculated and displayed
User can save platform presets
User can compare multiple platforms side-by-side

features.name: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Display inventory statistics and trends with charts
acceptance: Charts show total inventory value over time
Display most valuable cards in collection
Show card acquisition trends
User can filter by date range
Charts update when new cards added
Analytics export to PDF or CSV

features.name: Settings & Preferences
features.description: Expand settings view with user preferences and configuration
acceptance: User can set default currency
User can configure auto-capture settings
User can enable/disable haptic feedback
Settings persist across app launches
About screen shows app version
User can export/import data
